appRoles.description: Send SCEP challenges to Intune for certificate request validation.
Read PFX certificate requests and send certificates to Microsoft Intune.

Allow the telecom expense management app to send and receive device telecom and Wi-Fi data usage information, including phone number, with Intune to help analyze and manage data usage costs of corporate-owned devices.
appRoles.displayName: Send and receive device telecom and Wi-Fi data usage information with Microsoft Intune

appRoles.description: Allow this app to send device risk and threat information to Intune to help determine device compliance with corporate security policy.
appRoles.displayName: Send device threat information to Microsoft Intune

appRoles.description: Allow this app to receive information about devices (such as compliance and enrollment state) that are managed by Intune.
appRoles.displayName: Get device state and compliance information from Microsoft Intune

appRoles.description: Send device attributes to Microsoft Intune. Â
appRoles.displayName: Send device attributes to Microsoft Intune

appRoles.description: Grants access to the Intune data warehouse API
appRoles.displayName: Get data warehouse information from Microsoft Intune

appRoles.description: Allows the app to send partner compliance policies and its Azure AD Group assignment to Microsoft Intune without a signed-in user.
appRoles.displayName: Manage partner compliance policies with Microsoft Intune.

oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Grants access to the Intune data warehouse API
oauth2PermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Get data warehouse information from Microsoft Intune
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Grants access to the Intune data warehouse API
oauth2PermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Get data warehouse information from Microsoft Intune
